overview:
Revived Media is a performance based Mobile Lead Generation and Digital Ad Agency headquartered in Kansas City, Missouri. We work directly with Corporations, Agencies, Affiliates, Advertisers and Developers world-wide to drive high-quality leads and sales through our highly trained and experienced Internal Media Buying Team and fraud-free publisher base. We are the first and only full-court advertising agency that actually trains its advertisers and publishers in a one-on-one environment.

In the simplest of words, we connect Advertisers with our 10+ years of internal media buying and our 100% fraud free publisher base that consists of the most intelligent, hard-working and compliant affiliates so that we can continue pioneering the way in Performance Marketing and staying one-step ahead of “wanna-be’s” and “trying to be’s”.

Revived Media is entirely client-focused, we work FOR YOU, not for your money. Our rare mix of talent, passion and experience separates us from the rest. Every marketer and advertiser needs quality cost effective leads, that’s why at Revived Media, we operate our business based on full transparency and performance. Our campaigns are precisely executed to ensure your brand and products are served to the right audience, at the right time, in the right place. We are focused on improving online advertisers’ ROI while at the same time generating greater website revenue for online publishers.

To that effect, we offer complete development and execution of online marketing plans that include search optimization, social media marketing and online lead generation. We also employ our own Proprietary Mobile Tracking Platform - iMobiTrax.com which allows us to go above and beyond the rest with accurate post-click optimization technology for smartphones, tablets, applications and click-to-call campaigns.
